name: SERMA Group
legal: Public limited company with a management and a supervisory board
memberOrga: Serma Technologies (https://www.serma-technologies.com/),  Serma Ingenierie, Serma Energy, Serma ID MOS, Serma HCM.SYSTREL, Serma productivity engineering,  Science et Surface, AW2S, Serma Safety&Security, Serma NES, Serma International, (website with all links: https://www.serma.com/en/serma-group/subsidiaries-and-sites/)
goal: SERMA Group is a consultancy and expertise company specialised in embedded and industrial electronic systems, as well as information system security. Its sole model is to rely on teams of experienced experts, in-house laboratories and design offices, making it the independent European leader in its field. The Group has developed recognised expertise in its 5 core segments: electronic technologies, Energy, Micro-electronics, Embedded Systems Engineering and Safety & Cybersecurity of Systems.
interests: Business and Industry, Energy, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: Due to our experience and expertise in the Energy (Batteries, Solar panel, Fuel cells) and Electronic domains, we intend to contribute to public consultations, roadmaps or inception impact assessments in those fields. Participation to one industry forum is not excluded. Our activity toward EU will start on these topics.
